title: Who's Most Likely To?

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Decide which two people the switch user is going to answer questions about.
• Record their names on each switch e.g. "Mum" on one and "Dad" on the other.
• Ask the switch user a silly question, such as "Who’s most likely to fall asleep on the sofa?"
• The switch user answers by pressing the switch that matches their choice.

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to answer silly questions about people

extraPages.title: WHO'S MOST LIKELY TO: QUESTION IDEAS
extraPages.subtitle: WHO'S MOST LIKELY TO...
items: Spend all their money on something silly?
Have a lion as a pet?
